reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Art of Estates's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

content.about: Indianapolis Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Indianapolis area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
